entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing before morning. 40 percent chance of showers over southern sections early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 except southwest 50 gusting to 70 over eastern sections late this evening and overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
